last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Terrible timing keeps Su-yeon from coming clean to her crush. U-sik discovers that there is more to Yu-ri and Ki-bong's relationship.

name: Welcome to Waikiki
overview: Kang Dong-Goo dreams of becoming a movie director, but he is cynical due to bad luck. Cheon Joon-Ki wanted to follow in his father's footsteps and become an actor, but he is now just a minor actor. Bong-Doo-Sik came to Seoul to become a scenario writer, but things have not been easy for him.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: To finance their own film project, an aspiring director, actor and screenwriter run a Seoul guesthouse that brings antics and romance into their lives.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Actor Lee Jun-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Three young men running a guesthouse make a shocking discovery in one of their rooms. Later, one of them, a newbie actor, begins filming with his idol.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Han Yun-a's attempt to prove her worth to the household backfires. A filming delay forces Lee Jun-ki to live in scary costume makeup for 24 hours.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Kang Seo-jin learns that her crush is just as imperfect as she is. Jun-ki makes a painful sacrifice for a movie role. Yun-a reveals her life's dream.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: An embarrassing photo of Jun-ki goes viral, but leads to an opportunity. Yun-a tells her housemates about her past. Seo-jin interviews for a job.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A text message mishap threatens Bong Du-sik's chances with a new crush. Yun-a and Kang Dong-gu get the flu and are quarantined in a tent.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A fellow culinary student takes an interest in Yun-a. To buy more time to pay the rent, Jun-ki tells a lie that snowballs into a sudden engagement.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Misfortune brings Min Su-a to the guesthouse. Du-sik runs into his first love. Desperate to pay back the landlady, Jun-ki accepts a questionable job.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: As Du-sik tries to express his feelings to Yun Mal-geum, Dong-gu struggles to hide his from Yun-a. To earn cash, Jun-ki tries his hand at meokbang.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Dong-gu runs into problems while babysitting Han Sol. After hurting Seo-jin's chance at getting a journalism job, Jun-ki sets out to make things right.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Seo-jin and Jun-ki agonize over what happened the previous evening -- but for totally different reasons. Dong-gu comes to a realization about Yun-a.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Yun-a leaves Dong-gu with more questions than answers. Jun-ki hides from a UFC fighter whose girlfriend he stole. Su-a's undercover work pays off.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Jun-ki tries to view Seo-jin as a woman, but memories of her as a girl get in the way. A jealous Dong-gu challenges Song Hyeon-jun to a duel of sorts.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Su-a ropes Du-sik into helping her launch an online shopping mall. From a distance, Dong-gu spots his sister kissing a man, and demands to meet him.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Jun-ki and a co-worker compete to star in a commercial. Du-sik helps Su-a practice her driving skills. Dong-gu gets a lunch date with Yun-a.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: While Seo-jin and Jun-ki secretly go on a weekend getaway together, the rest of the Waikiki crew visit another guesthouse to get ideas for their own.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: When Dong-gu refuses to speak to his sister, she declares she's going on a shaving strike until he does. Hyeon-jun has something to tell Yun-a.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Dong-gu and Yun-a go on their first official date. A romantic declaration that Du-sik makes to a new Ukrainian houseguest gets lost in translation.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: An obsessed fan begins to stalk Jun-ki. Dong-gu and Yun-a struggle to have their first kiss. Su-a gives Du-sik good -- and bad -- dating advice.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Su-a starts her own fashion line. Jun-ki is given a publicity stunt to perform -- involving a pole dance. Yun-a meets her idol, a rapper.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Sol's father begs Yun-a to forgive him. Seo-jin asks Jun-ki for time to reconsider their relationship. Su-a makes a confession to Du-sik.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: To finance their own film project, an aspiring director, actor and screenwriter run a Seoul guesthouse that brings antics and romance into their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A struggling actor, an aspiring singer and a baseball hopeful scramble to keep their guesthouse afloat after an unlucky blow from Mother Nature.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Caught between two women, Cha U-sik comes up with a rather sloppy plan to impress one and avoid the other. Lee Jun-ki faces a major acting challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Han Su-yeon jumps into the job market. Kook Ki-bong and Jun-ki try to promote their guesthouse by appearing on TV.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ki-bong suffers the consequences of letting Cha Yu-ri in the house, while poor U-sik spirals out of control as old feelings creep back into his heart.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Su-yeon sets U-sik up for a blind date. But could this be a trap? Jun-ki and Ki-bong battle for the ownership rights to ... a blanket.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: In an effort to protect their friends' feelings, U-sik and Jun-ki hide the truth and bear the heavy burden of silence.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Jun-ki immerses himself in the world of his character. U-sik's attempt to help Su-yeon keep her job gets slightly out of hand.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: An invitation to a birthday party puts U-sik's life in jeopardy. Ki-bong seeks comfort in a box of chocolates.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Kim Jeong-eun finds it hard to admit her feelings for a longtime friend. Su-yeon meets a speech coach with an unfortunate habit.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A quiz show awakens Yu-ri's competitive side. Jun-ki's sudden rise to stardom comes at a price as young fans keep a watchful eye on him.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Jun-ki seeks the help of a professional to bring Rebecca back to life. U-sik jumps through impossible hoops to confess his feelings to a friend.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Ki-bong's search for employment continues in blissful ignorance. Jun-ki's inability to remember the name of a classmate takes him down a rabbit hole.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: An exciting opportunity comes knocking, but a moral dilemma keeps Jun-ki from taking the job. Ki-bong finds himself unable to get out of bed.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: In an effort to cheer up a friend, Jeong-eun spills her deepest, darkest secrets. Yu-ri and Ki-bong's first date gets off on the wrong foot.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Jun-ki learns to develop feelings for an acting partner. Su-yeon prepares a pitch for a new show, while unsettling feelings of jealousy distract her.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Terrible timing keeps Su-yeon from coming clean to her crush. U-sik discovers that there is more to Yu-ri and Ki-bong's relationship.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Actor Lee Jun-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.
